QuestData.Title: An Abandoned Research Camp
QuestData.Description: You find what appears to be a piece of research equipment, left behind when this camp was abandoned. Chiseled onto the side of the device are the words "PROPERTY OF MARSHAL EXPADISHUNS".$b$bPerhaps you might find someone who could use this?
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Research Equipment to Hol'anyee Marshal at Marshal's Stand.
QuestData.RewardText: Well I'll be... that's Shizzle's old portable dinomometer! Where did you find this?$b$bI'm surprised it's still functional, even after all these years. I'll have it delivered to Shizzle promptly.
